name: CUSTOM Text Block #2

text.default: Shea Butter, Cane Sugar, Avocado Butter, Green Tea, Pomegranate, Goji Fruit & Coffee Seed Extracts, Organic Blue Matcha, Vitamins C & E.
text.label: Text
text.description: Select the text you want to display as a hyperlink, add a '#' symbol in the link field, and then click 'Insert'. Use blocks in the same order as links to add text blocks for links.

item_width_mobile.label: Item Width - Mobile
item_width_mobile.description: Please check the layout on mobile devices. If any item blocks overflow, adjust the item width, padding and font size accordingly based on your content.

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Overlay doesn't work with gradients; remove image to apply gradient.

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
